name: Lantern (itch) (Mikkles)
description:
Lantern is a short horror game about a man with a wind-up lantern. Collect the runes, place them on the church pedestals, and don't let the monster catch you.

WASD to move.
Scroll Wheel up or down to wind your lantern.

The monster will chase you when it sees you, but can't see your light. Over time your lantern will run out of battery. Wind it to increase the radius of the light, but be careful; the monster will pinpoint your location when you do this.
